{"id":949937427,"question_id":2791,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 1 month","timestamp":1684033027,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/949937427/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Losers of the Circular Game","memory":"43.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int[] circularGameLosers(int n, int k) {\n        boolean[] seen = new boolean[n]; // f, f, f\n        \n        // k 2k 3k\n        // ooo  \n        // 12345\n          // ^   \n        \n        \n        int idx =0;\n        seen[0]=true;\n        for(int i=1;i<=n; i++){\n            int step = i *k;\n            int next = (idx+step)%n;\n            if(seen[next])\n                break;\n            seen[next]=true;\n            idx = next;\n            \n        }\n        \n              \n              \n        \n        \n        \n//         int mul=1;\n//         int idx = 0;\n//         // seen[0]=true;      //t, f, f\n        \n//         for(int i=0;i<n;i++){\n//             int step=(i+1)*k;//2\n//             mul++;\n//             int next = (idx+step)%n; //2 \n//             if(seen[next])\n//                 break;\n//             idx = next; // 2\n//         }\n        List<Integer> list = new ArrayList<>();\n        for(int i=0; i<n; i++){\n            if(seen[i]==false)\n                list.add(i);\n        }\n        \n        int[] res = new int[list.size()];\n        for(int i=0; i<list.size(); i++){\n            res[i]= list.get(i)+1;\n        }\n        \n        \n        \n        return res;\n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-losers-of-the-circular-game","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
